name: The Carnegie Bedside Table
description: Experience opulent luxury with The Carnegie Bedside Table. Meticulously crafted for a refined taste, it sets a new standard for a luxury bedside table. Embrace Sand Lati Veneer, immerse yourself in the tactile allure of open grain Sand Lati veneer, showcasing unparalleled craftsmanship quality. Radiate Grace with Gentle Curved Corners, Soft, rounded corners exude an aura of grace, infusing warmth into your bedroom space. Sleek, Functional Design, The Carnegie boasts a single, spacious drawer with a soft close mechanism, seamlessly blending form and function. Effortless Integration, Ample Storage, The unassuming yet striking silhouette ensures The Carnegie effortlessly integrates into any bedroom setting, offering ample storage for your essentials. Opulent Burnished Bronze Handles, Modern, sophisticated handles in burnished bronze add a touch of understated opulence, elevating the overall aesthetic. Warm Lati Finish with Premium Veneers, Immerse yourself in the rich warmth of the Davidson collection's new Lati finish, paying homage to the natural grain and enduring beauty of premium veneers. Versatile Contemporary Harmony, The Carnegie's contemporary design harmonizes effortlessly with a wide range of interior styles, ensuring it complements and enhances any space it graces. Elevate your sleep sanctuary with The Carnegie Luxury Bedside Table, where luxury and practicality converge. Experience the epitome of designer bedside tables, exclusively at DAVIDSON London.
